lab5.Temperature

Class TempController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab5.Temperature.TempController

  • public class TempController
extends java.lang.Object

    Temperature Controller

    This controller deals with the temperature objects, such as the furnace, air con, temp model and the temp sensor
    It creates the temperature simulation threads
    When necessary it sends info the main controller to update the main view
    Since:
    2016-04-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Withams
